Welcome to the future of browsing with Crypto Start Tab â€“ your personalized and sleek new tab page designed to enhance your online experience. With this extension, you'll get:

Google Search Integration: Quickly search the web right from your new tab page.
Quick Access to Top Sites: Easily access your most visited websites with just a click.
Real-Time Cryptocurrency Prices: Stay updated with live prices of your favorite cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and many more.
Customizable Crypto List: Choose which cryptocurrencies to display and track in real-time.
Clean and Modern Design: Enjoy a visually appealing and user-friendly interface that makes browsing a pleasure.
